step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance.
Great job stretching your arm overhead. Remember to keep it straight.
Excellent! Open your palm and fingers wide.
Well done making a fist and tightening your muscles while inhaling.
Good job on the second rep's starting position. Keep that arm straight overhead.
Nice stretch overhead. Ensure your arm remains straight throughout.
You're doing great opening your hand wide. Keep up the good work.
Excellent fist and muscle tightening on the exhale. Visualize the fluid moving.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Overhead Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance. Open your hand wide and make a tight fist while inhaling, then relax as you exhale. Keep up the good work!
